desc: We are a clothing brand that wants to promote positivity and raise awareness around Mental Health issues with a touch of Geordie heart & spirit through custom designs for T-Shirts, Hoodies, Hats & Caps and stuff. Our aim is to donate 10% of each sale we make from the custom designs we sell to a mental health charity.

layout.text: …as we say in Newcastle! We’re looking to promote positivity & increase awareness around mental health issues, using a little Geordie heart and spirit. Join the conversation on our social media channels, and grab yourself a t-shirt, hoodie, hat or cap. Your support will allow us to donate 10% from each sale to the Mental Health Foundation through our partnership with Work for Good. Find out more below…”
